str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
A showing, proof, demonstration, sign, token. From endeiknumi; indication.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: From dikaios; to render just or innocent.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
